ygData.subject: Re: Bard quests
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Absolutely.  Some idiot last night attacked Genni and trained the entire Temple to the zone.  Oddly enough Gardern stayed behind (out of his agro range, or
ygData.messageBody:
>It's her brother who makes the lambent sapphires, which is
>what I need. Do you think that Gardern would still cough
>up lambent sapphires if Genni wasn't around?

Absolutely. Some idiot last night attacked Genni and trained
the entire Temple to the zone. Oddly enough Gardern stayed
behind (out of his agro range, or player died) Then Genni
was no where to be found, tracking or not. I still got the
lambent sapphire to work, without her visually in the zone.

Harmonic Distortion, 39th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
